stories.text: You're a gamedev wannabe star. Game Jam starts in a DAY
You arrive to Poznan a few hours before the Great Game Jam
opts: a: Go to free book stand
b: Go to the shisha club

stories.text: There are some books in the stand.
opts: b: Pick Andrzej Mazur's HTML 5 Game Dev book
c: Pick neurolinguistic programming for dummies

stories.text: You read it for a couple hours. Now you can make a game. So easy!
opts: a: Take a city bike to the Game Jam
b: Take a tram to the jam place.
